summary: An email from an Engineering Technician at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Federal Bureau of Prisons, dated April 4, 2018, requesting information about a camera project from a reference provided by someone named 'rom Signet'. The email seeks a Statement of Work or related paperwork for a similar camera installation project.

persons.name: Engineering Technician
persons.role: Engineering Technician at MCC New York Federal Bureau of Prisons
persons.context: Author of the email requesting information about a camera project for the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Rom Signet
persons.context: Person who provided the recipient's name as a reference for a camera project similar to what the MCC is considering.

connections.description: Rom Signet provided the Engineering Technician with the recipient's name as a reference for a camera project.

events.title: Camera Project Inquiry Email
events.description: An Engineering Technician at MCC New York sends an email seeking documentation (Statement of Work) for a camera installation project, using a reference from Rom Signet.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 4, 2018, regarding a camera project at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The email is sent by an Engineering Technician at the MCC New York Federal Bureau of Prisons.
The technician references 'rom Signet' as the source who provided the recipient's name as a reference for a similar camera project.
The email requests a Statement of Work or other paperwork related to the camera installation project.
